TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Organisation Message Element with all possible Elements.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create the correct MIP data for all the elements its implementation allows for (defined at IDT Schemas > Organisations.xsd > Organisation) and the Consumers are able to correctly understand (and display) it.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates message elements for Key Organisations with all the Elements its implementation allows for. The Consumers receive the data and process them.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created the 'Ground Picture > Forces' topic. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Organisation and all elements are processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer creates the Organisation with name XXX_OR_001 and fills ALL the elements its implementation allows for.
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_OR_001
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Organisation and all elements that the Producer created.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer creates an update for the object by changing ALL elements its implementation allows for.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers receive and process (and display) the Organisation and all elements that the Producer created.
